sentences: Ta on pidevalt vabandanud oma vigade eest.
context: The Estonian verb 'vabandan' means to apologize or make an apology. It is commonly used when expressing regret for something one has done or failed to do, or for causing inconvenience or offense. The word belongs to the -da/-d conjugation group in Estonian and can be used in different tenses and moods as shown in the example sentences.
